mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_board where status = 'Y'

select b.board_no , board_title , user_id , read_count , date_format(regist_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as regist_date , ( select count(*) from tbl_attachment where ref_board_no = b.board_no ) as attach_count from tbl_board b join tbl_user on (user_no = board_writer) where status = 'Y' order by board_no desc limit #{offset}, #{display}

select board_no , board_title , board_content , user_id , date_format(regist_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as regist_date from tbl_board join tbl_user on (user_no = board_writer) where status = 'Y' and board_no = #{no}
select file_no , file_path , filesystem_name , original_name from tbl_attachment where ref_board_no = #{no}
